name: Pocket Vindicators
description:
Aww man bro, Planet Destroyer has done it this time! Choose your Pocket Vindicator: Allan, Nova, and Max are available! Help them rescue Jay from Planet Destroyer.  

Prepare yourself for a unique experience never before felt. This game has a high focus on audio so perk up them ears and max out your speakers because these catchy melodies, beats, baselines and songs will have you bumping!

Features 

•Collect Coins To Unlock Levels & Chapters 

•Unlock Your Pocket Vindicators Super Version 

•Collect Gems To Earn Bonus Coins 

Happy Trails Vindicators!
